body.p: Upon thinking over what I wrote to you on yesterday at bottom of Mr Barkley's letter, I believe I stated that Mr B. Stood at head of profession, as Lawyer. I ought to have used word pension before the word Lawyer if I did not.
As although Mr B. is qualified to be a La^w^yer in the Courts yet he never has been but has devoted himself entirely to Government claims and in that business he stands at the head.

Respectfully
J M Hewett
2d Ky Battery
